name: le-ghost
description: Automated curation system for Ghost CMS themes directory

scripts.validate: npm run build && npm run validate:config && npm run validate:data
scripts.validate:config: node -e "import('./dist/config.js').then(m => { const cm = new m.ConfigManager(); const result = cm.validateConfigFile(); console.log(result.valid ? '✅ Config valid' : '❌ Config invalid:', result.errors); })"
scripts.validate:data: node -e "import('./dist/config.js').then(m => { const dl = new m.DataLoader(); const result = dl.validateAll(); console.log(result.valid ? '✅ Data valid' : '❌ Data invalid:', result.errors); })"
scripts.init: npm run build && node -e "import('./dist/config.js').then(m => { const dl = new m.DataLoader(); dl.createDefaultDataFiles(); const cm = new m.ConfigManager(); cm.createDefaultConfig(); console.log('✅ Default configuration and data files created'); })"
scripts.stats: npm run build && node -e "import('./dist/cache-manager.js').then(m => { const cm = m.createCacheManager('cache', 3600000); cm.printStats(); })"

author: Le Ghost Maintainer
